alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay, northwestern Wilkin, southeastern Cass and northern Richland Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kindred, or 15 miles southwest of Fargo, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horace, Kindred, Abercrombie, Davenport, Walcott, Christine and Wolverton. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 36 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
